text.div:
• Include these codes as defined in http://fhir.org/guides/who/smart-immunization/CodeSystem/IMMZ.D4
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    DE162Currently pregnantThe client is currently pregnant
    DE165Severely immunosuppressedThe client is known to be severely immunocompromised or immunosuppressed
    DE166History of anaphylactic reactionsThe client is known to have history of anaphylaxis in the past. Anaphylaxis is a severe and potentially life-threatening allergic reaction that can occur rapidly after exposure to an allergen or vaccine component.
    DE167Severe allergic reactionsThe client is known to have severe allergic reaction to vaccine
    DE168Symptomatic HIV infectionThe client is experiencing HIV-related symptoms

name: IMMZ_D4_DE161
title: IMMZ.D4.DE161 ValueSet for Potential Contraindications
description: ValueSet for Potential Contraindications for IMMZ.D4.DE161.
